content: to the system configuration file ====> /user_v /* User_Volume_List */ /**********************************************************************/ /* These volumes contain the minidisks for your guests, as well as */ /* the product disks for each installed release of z/VM in the SSI */ /* cluster. Volumes that hold "local" minidisks, i.e., minidisks */ /* unique to a single member system, should be wrapped in BEGIN/END */ /* Page and Tdisk volumes for Member 1 */ /**********************************************************************/ RDBKZVMG: BEGIN CP_Owned Slot 255 VP155E RDBKZVMG: END /**********************************************************************/ /* Page and Tdisk volumes for Member 2 */ /**********************************************************************/ RDBKZVMH: BEGIN CP_Owned Slot 255 VP1562 RDBKZVMH: END /* Page and Tdisk volumes for Member 1 */ /**********************************************************************/ RDBKZVMG: BEGIN CP_Owned Slot 253 VP155E CP_Owned
